content: every part of yoshi apart from the belly and the boot details is worked in rounds - do **not** join at the end of each round **finished size ** approximately 17 5 cm x 12 cm 6 8 inches x 4 7 inches **yarn ** i use 100% acrylic yarn - schachenmayr bravo to be exact you can pick whatever yarn and colors work for you **crochet hook ** 3 mm **you will also need ** * scissors * pins * tapestry needle or needle and thread * black and white felt * hot glue or needle and thread * toy stuffing
